statements: SELECT * FROM MarketTrends
SELECT trend_name, demand_forecast FROM MarketTrends
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_id = 1
SELECT trend_name, investment_plan FROM MarketTrends WHERE demand_forecast > 0.5
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_name DESC
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_name DESC, trend_id ASC
SELECT trend_name, demand_forecast FROM MarketTrends WHERE demand_forecast > 100 ORDER BY demand_forecast DESC
SELECT trend_name, investment_plan FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_id BETWEEN 3 AND 6 ORDER BY trend_id ASC
SELECT MAX(demand_forecast) AS max_demand_forecast, MIN(demand_forecast) AS min_demand_forecast FROM MarketTrends
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE investment_plan LIKE '%budget%'
SELECT * FROM market_analysis;
SELECT analysis_date, market_demand FROM market_analysis WHERE market_demand > 100;
SELECT * FROM market_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id, wind_energy_demand FROM market_analysis ORDER BY wind_energy_demand DESC;
SELECT plan_id, investment_amount FROM investment_plan WHERE investment_duration >= 5;
SELECT * FROM market_analysis WHERE market_demand > 100 AND wind_energy_demand < 50;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date FROM market_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(market_demand) AS avg_demand, MAX(wind_energy_demand) AS max_demand FROM market_analysis;
SELECT * FROM investment_plan WHERE investment_amount > 500000 AND investment_duration >= 5 ORDER BY plan_date ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, market_demand, wind_energy_demand FROM market_analysis WHERE market_demand BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM market_trends;
SELECT trend_name, demand_forecast FROM market_trends WHERE demand_forecast > 50000;
SELECT * FROM energy_investments ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT project_name, investment_amount FROM energy_investments WHERE investment_amount BETWEEN 1000000 AND 5000000;
SELECT wind_location, energy_capacity FROM wind_energy WHERE energy_capacity >= 1000;
SELECT trend_name, demand_forecast FROM market_trends ORDER BY demand_forecast DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, investment_amount FROM energy_investments WHERE investment_amount > 100000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM wind_energy WHERE energy_capacity > 500 ORDER BY wind_location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trend_name, demand_forecast FROM market_trends WHERE trend_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY trend_id ASC;
SELECT project_name, investment_amount FROM energy_investments WHERE investment_amount BETWEEN 50000 AND 200000 ORDER BY project_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trend_type, demand_forecast FROM MarketTrends WHERE demand_forecast > 1000;
SELECT farm_name, capacity_mw FROM WindFarms ORDER BY capacity_mw DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' AND production_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT investment_name, amount, investment_date FROM Investments ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT farm_name, location, capacity_mw FROM WindFarms WHERE capacity_mw > 1000 ORDER BY capacity_mw ASC;
SELECT investment_name, amount FROM Investments WHERE investment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND amount > 50000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY farm_id, production_date DESC;
SELECT id, trend_type, demand_forecast FROM MarketTrends WHERE demand_forecast < 1000 ORDER BY demand_forecast ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends;
SELECT id, date FROM demand_forecasts ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wind_energy_investments WHERE investment_amount > 50000;
SELECT provider_name, rating FROM energy_providers WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM market_trends ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, trend_description FROM market_trends ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasts WHERE forecasted_demand > 100 ORDER BY forecasted_demand DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT provider_name, location, rating FROM energy_providers WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, investment_amount, investment_type FROM wind_energy_investments WHERE investment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
